title: Wedding
description: A beautiful celebration of love and commitment, a wedding marks the beginning of a new life journey for the couple. It's a day filled with joy, love, and cherished moments.

title: Birthday Party
description: Birthday parties are a time to celebrate another year of life. Whether it's a child's playful celebration or an adult's milestone, birthdays are all about fun, cakes, and good company.

title: Anniversary
description: Anniversaries are a special occasion to commemorate years of togetherness. Whether it's a couple's first anniversary or a golden one, it's a time for love and reflection.

title: Engagement Party
description: An engagement party marks the beginning of a couple's journey to marriage. It's a time to celebrate their commitment and share their joy with friends and family.

title: Retirement Party
description: Retirement parties honor the hard work and dedication of someone who is embarking on a new chapter of life. It's a time to relax, enjoy, and look forward to the future.

title: Baby Shower
description: Baby showers are a joyful occasion to celebrate the upcoming arrival of a new family member. They are filled with gifts, games, and excitement for the parents-to-be.
